product.priceNote: This price is exclusive of taxes.
product.description: High-quality stretch fabric with wrinkle-free finish. Comfortable and durable for daily wear.

reviews.title: Rating & Reviews
reviews.sampleComment1: Really comfortable shirt — excellent fit and fabric.
reviews.sampleComment2: Color matches the pictures, and delivery was fast.
reviews.sampleComment3: Good value for the price. I would buy again.
reviews.sampleComment4: Stitched well and feels premium. Highly recommend.

footer.description: Premium kids photography & products — quality and care in every item.
